fact: Neraka (Jahannam) is a Dicipta place Disediakan by Allah for the disbelievers and wrongdoers.
source: al-Quran 67:6 — 'Indeed, for those who disbelieve in their Lord is the Hukuman of Neraka, and wretched is the destination.'

fact: Neraka has Tujuh distinct gates, each for a specific group of sinners.
source: al-Quran 15:44 — 'It has Tujuh gates; for every Pintu gerbang is of them a portion designated.'

fact: Each Pintu gerbang leads to a Menurunkan, more severe Tingkat of Hukuman.
source: Tafsir of Ibn Kathir on al-Quran 15:44

fact: The Tujuh named levels mentioned by scholars are: Jahannam, Laza, Hutama, Sa‘ir, Saqar, Jahim, Hawiyah.
source: Ibn al-Qayyim — Hadi al-Arwah

fact: The bottom of Neraka is for the hypocrites (munafiqeen).
source: al-Quran 4:145 — 'Indeed, the hypocrites will be in the lowest depths of the Api...'

fact: Neraka is vast beyond comprehension.
source: Hadis — Sahih Muslim 2846: 'The sun and the moon will be rolled up in Neraka on the Hari of Resurrection.'

fact: Neraka will be brought on the Hari of Judgment with seventy thousand reins, each pulled by seventy thousand angels.
source: Sahih Muslim 2842

fact: Neraka is Hitam and Gelap, with no Cahaya except the Api itself.
source: Ibn Rajab al-Hanbali — 'Ahwal al-Qubur' citing earlier reports

fact: The depth of Neraka is immense: a stone thrown from its edge would Jatuh for seventy years before reaching the bottom.
source: Sahih Muslim 2844

fact: Neraka has layers (darakaat) — opposite of Syurga's levels (darajaat).
source: al-Quran 4:145 & scholars like Ibn Taymiyyah

fact: The Jambatan (as-Sirat) passes over Neraka.
source: Sahih Bukhari 7439

fact: The Hellfire roars with fury and exhalations.
source: al-Quran 67:7 — 'When they are thrown into it, they Mendengar from it a [terrible] inhaling while it boils up.'

fact: Neraka is enclosed and has gates that Mengunci.
source: al-Quran 90:19-20 — 'But those who disbelieve in Our verses — they are the companions of the left. Upon them is a Api closed in.'

fact: Its gates are massive and heavy.
source: Imam al-Qurtubi — 'at-Tadhkira'

fact: Neraka is Di bawah all other creations.
source: Reported by al-Tabari and Ibn Abi Hatim (Tafsir of 83:16-17)

fact: The Rakyat of Neraka will be gathered and driven towards it in crowds.
source: al-Quran 39:71

fact: The gates of Neraka will be opened only when they Tiba.
source: al-Quran 39:71 — 'Until, when they reach it, its gates are opened…'

fact: Neraka has keepers (angels) who Berdiri at its gates.
source: al-Quran 39:71

fact: The number of Neraka's keepers is nineteen.
source: al-Quran 74:30

fact: Their chief is named Malik.
source: al-Quran 43:77 — 'And they will call, "O Malik, Membenarkan your Lord put an Menamatkan to us!"'

fact: Neraka has a steep descent; its depth is unimaginable to humans.
source: Sahih Muslim 2844 — 'If a stone were thrown from the edge of Neraka, it would Jatuh for seventy years before reaching its bottom.'

fact: The distance between each of its levels is like the distance between the heavens and the earth.
source: Tafsir Ibn Kathir on al-Quran 4:145 and Sahih reports

fact: The names of its Tujuh levels indicate increasing severity of Azab.
source: Imam Al-Qurtubi — Al-Tadhkirah fi Ahwal al-Mawta

fact: Its upper parts are less intense than its Menurunkan depths, which are reserved for the worst sinners.
source: al-Quran 4:145 and scholarly consensus (Ibn Taymiyyah, Ibn Kathir)

fact: The gates of Neraka will be shut upon its inhabitants and never opened again.
source: al-Quran 90:20 — 'Upon them will be Api closed over.'

fact: The gates are massive and locked with Besi bars.
source: Tafsir al-Tabari on al-Quran 39:71

fact: Its layers and gates represent Keadilan: each Orang berdosa goes to the Tingkat fitting their deeds.
source: Ibn al-Qayyim — Hadi al-Arwah

fact: The inhabitants will be dragged to their assigned gates in groups.
source: al-Quran 39:71 — 'And those who disbelieved will be driven to Neraka in groups...'

fact: When its gates Membuka, it emits a furious roaring Bunyi.
source: al-Quran 67:7 — 'When they are thrown into it, they Mendengar from it a dreadful inhaling while it boils up.'

fact: The Api itself is conscious and enraged at the disbelievers.
source: al-Quran 67:8 — 'It almost bursts with rage...'

fact: The flames leap up like giant castles.
source: al-Quran 77:31-32 — 'Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress, as if they were yellow camels.'

fact: The walls of Neraka are extremely high and confining.
source: Tafsir of Mujahid on al-Quran 90:20 and 18:29

fact: It is a prison with no Melarikan diri; its Struktur itself prevents fleeing.
source: al-Quran 18:29 — 'Indeed, We have Disediakan for the wrongdoers a Api whose walls will Mengelilingi them...'

fact: Neraka has a covering lid that will be closed over its Rakyat.
source: al-Quran 90:20 — 'Upon them will be Api closed over.'

fact: It has layers one Di atas another, trapping Rakyat inside.
source: Tafsir Ibn Kathir on al-Quran 4:145

fact: Its size is so great that it can Mengandungi all disbelievers from the time of Adam until the last human.
source: Sahih al-Bukhari 4848 — 'Neraka will Menepati saying, "Are there any more?" until the Lord places His Kaki over it...'

fact: The gates are guarded by fierce angels called Zabaniyah.
source: al-Quran 96:18 — 'We will call the Zabaniyah.'

fact: There are nineteen chief angels in charge of Neraka.
source: al-Quran 74:30 — 'Over it are nineteen [angels].'

fact: The chief of the angels of Neraka is named Malik.
source: al-Quran 43:77 — 'And they will call, "O Malik, Membenarkan your Lord put an Menamatkan to us!"'

fact: Neraka is completely sealed and Melarikan diri is impossible.
source: al-Quran 78:21-23 — 'Indeed, Neraka has been lying in wait... for the transgressors... they will Kekal in it for ages.'

fact: Neraka has valleys, mountains, and pits within it.
source: Hadis — Musnad Ahmad 22939: 'In Neraka there is a Lembah... from whose heat even Neraka seeks refuge.'

fact: Each Lembah is assigned to specific sins, like arrogance or hypocrisy.
source: Ibn al-Qayyim — Hadi al-Arwah

fact: The terrain of Neraka is made of burning coals and Melebur metal.
source: al-Quran 18:29 — 'Indeed, We have Disediakan for the wrongdoers a Api whose walls will Mengelilingi them. And if they call for relief, they will be relieved with Air like Melebur brass...'

fact: There are chains, collars, and fetters embedded in its Struktur.
source: al-Quran 76:4 — 'Indeed, We have Disediakan for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.'

fact: Its ground burns and its air suffocates; it is not like any worldly place.
source: Al-Qurtubi — Al-Tadhkirah; based on multiple Hadis about its heat and choking Asap

fact: Neraka contains chains seventy cubits long to Mengikat its dwellers.
source: al-Quran 69:32 — 'Then in a Rantai whose length is seventy cubits insert him.'

fact: Its walls are extremely thick to Menghalang Melarikan diri or outside influence.
source: Tafsir al-Qurtubi on al-Quran 18:29

fact: Neraka is in a constant Negara of rage and boiling.
source: al-Quran 67:7 — 'When they are thrown into it, they Mendengar from it a dreadful inhaling while it boils up.'

fact: The Api of Neraka was kindled for a thousand years until it became red, then another thousand until it became Putih, and another thousand until it became Hitam.
source: Hadis — At-Tirmidhi 2591 (Hasan)

fact: The darkness of Neraka is absolute — its Api gives no Cahaya, only heat.
source: Narrations from Ibn Mas'ud (reported by al-Bayhaqi)

fact: Its Asap and flames form canopies that Melindungi the inhabitants.
source: al-Quran 56:43-44 — 'And shadow of Hitam Asap, neither cool nor beneficial.'

fact: Neraka is described as having 'layers' that sinners descend into according to their deeds.
source: al-Quran 4:145 — 'Indeed, the hypocrites will be in the lowest depths of the Api...'

fact: The terrain constantly shifts — like moving sand dunes of Api.
source: Reported in works of Ibn al-Qayyim (Hadi al-Arwah)

fact: Neraka itself will be dragged into the Judgment Arena as a living entity.
source: Sahih Muslim 2842 — 'Neraka will be brought on that Hari having seventy thousand reins...'

fact: The pressure of Neraka crushes its dwellers' bones together.
source: Hadis — al-Tirmidhi 2575 (Hasan)

fact: Its gates Membuka only once, to admit the sinners — then Menutup forever.
source: al-Quran 39:71-72 — 'Until, when they reach it, its gates are opened... then its gates are closed behind them.'

fact: Neraka's gates are so immense that their hinges alone could crush mountains.
source: Tafsir of Ibn Kathir on al-Quran 39:71

fact: The Bunyi of its opening is like a thunderous Mengaung shaking the heavens.
source: al-Quran 67:7 — 'They Mendengar from it a dreadful inhaling while it boils up.'

fact: The keepers of Neraka never Menunjukkan pity or Rahmat to its inhabitants.
source: al-Quran 66:6 — 'Over it are angels, harsh and severe; they do not Derhaka Allah...'

fact: Its lowest Lubang is called Hawiyah, the most severe and bottomless place.
source: al-Quran 101:9 — 'His refuge will be the Abyss (al-Hawiyah).'

fact: The floor of Neraka burns like a blazing furnace with no place to Berdiri or Berehat.
source: al-Quran 18:29 — '...Indeed, We have Disediakan for the wrongdoers a Api whose walls will Mengelilingi them...'

fact: The atmosphere is filled with firestorms and scorching winds.
source: al-Quran 78:21 — 'Indeed, Neraka has been lying in wait...'

fact: Neraka constantly cries 'Are there any more?' showing its vastness.
source: Sahih al-Bukhari 4848 and Sahih Muslim 2848

fact: The flames Naik as tall as castles, symbolizing its colossal scale.
source: al-Quran 77:31-32 — 'It throws sparks like palaces...'

fact: There is no Keluar, doorway, or Terowong out once someone enters.
source: al-Quran 43:74 — 'Indeed, the criminals will be in the Hukuman of Neraka, abiding eternally.'

fact: Neraka itself will Bercakap on the Hari of Judgment, testifying against those who are to Masuk it.
source: Hadis — Musnad Ahmad 22939 and al-Quran 41:20-21 (limbs testify)

fact: The Api of Neraka is seventy times hotter than the Api of this world.
source: Sahih al-Bukhari 3265 — 'Your Api is one part of seventy parts of the Api of Neraka.'

fact: The heat is so intense it melts Kulit and Daging instantly.
source: al-Quran 4:56 — 'Every time their skins are roasted through We will Mengganti them with other skins so they may Merasa the Hukuman.'

fact: Hellfire burns Hitam and gives no Cahaya, only consuming darkness.
source: Hadis — At-Tirmidhi 2591: 'It became Hitam and Gelap; it does not Memberi Cahaya.'

fact: The Api penetrates the bones and marrow, not just the Kulit.
source: Narration from Ibn Mas'ud in Tafsir Ibn Kathir on 4:56

fact: The Api consumes everything but never diminishes.
source: al-Quran 74:28-29 — 'It lets nothing Kekal and leaves nothing unburned, blackening the Kulit.'

fact: It renews the bodies of its inhabitants endlessly so they can continue to Merasa Sakit.
source: al-Quran 4:56

fact: The Api produces noxious fumes that choke and suffocate.
source: al-Quran 56:43-44 — 'And shadow of Hitam Asap, neither cool nor beneficial.'

fact: The heat causes their brains to boil like seething Air.
source: al-Quran 22:19-20 — '...boiling Air will be poured over their heads, melting what is in their bellies and their skins.'

fact: The inhabitants' lips will be burned off, exposing their Gigi.
source: Hadis — Musnad Ahmad 22939: 'Their upper lips will Mengecut back until they reach the middle of their heads, and their Menurunkan lips will hang down to their navels.'

fact: The Api burns through Besi and stone as easily as paper.
source: Ibn al-Qayyim — Hadi al-Arwah, citing early Salaf

fact: The fuel of Neraka is disbelievers and stones.
source: al-Quran 2:24 — '...the Api whose fuel is men and stones, Disediakan for the disbelievers.'

fact: The stones are sulfur (brimstone) which burns intensely.
source: al-Quran 11:82 — '...stones of baked clay, marked from your Lord.'

fact: The Api feeds on itself and grows stronger over time.
source: al-Quran 104:6-7 — 'It is the Api of Allah, kindled, which leaps up over the hearts.'

fact: It surrounds its inhabitants completely, with flames Di atas, Di bawah, and on all sides.
source: al-Quran 29:55 — '...the Api will engulf them from Di atas them and from Di bawah their feet.'

fact: Hellfire will Menarik the Kulit and Daging off bones like Melebur wax.
source: al-Quran 70:16 — 'It will Membuang the scalp.'

fact: Even their intestines will Terbakar and spill out from heat.
source: Sahih Muslim 2989 — 'A man will be punished in the Api and his intestines will Datang out.'

fact: The heat will make their bodies swell enormously then burst.
source: Hadis — Sahih Muslim 2851: 'The molar Gigi of a Orang kafir will be like Mount Uhud and the thickness of his Kulit will be forty-two cubits.'

fact: The Api makes their Darah and pus boil and ooze from their bodies.
source: al-Quran 14:17 — 'He will gulp it but will hardly be able to swallow it, and Kematian will Datang to him from everywhere...' (Tafsir: describing pus and boiling fluid)

fact: Their faces will be scorched and disfigured beyond recognition.
source: al-Quran 23:104 — 'The Api will Terbakar their faces, and they will grin with displaced lips.'

fact: The Api produces a terrifying roaring Bunyi as it blazes.
source: al-Quran 67:7 — 'They Mendengar from it a dreadful inhaling while it boils up.'

fact: The sparks of Neraka are as large as castles.
source: al-Quran 77:32 — 'Indeed, it throws sparks as huge as a fortress.'

fact: Its flames leap up as high as the sky.
source: al-Quran 55:35-37 — 'A Nyalaan of Api and Asap will be sent upon you... and when the sky is Memisah apart and becomes rosy like Melebur Minyak.'

fact: Hellfire produces no Cahaya despite its intensity.
source: Hadis — At-Tirmidhi 2591: 'It became Hitam and Gelap; it does not Memberi Cahaya.'

fact: The Api pursues and engulfs the Rakyat from all sides.
source: al-Quran 18:29 — '...a Api whose walls will Mengelilingi them.'

fact: The ground itself is made of Api and Melebur metal.
source: al-Quran 22:19-20 — '...and scalding Air will be poured upon their heads...'

fact: Neraka contains rivers of boiling Air and Melebur Tembaga.
source: Tafsir al-Qurtubi on al-Quran 22:19-20

fact: Neraka's flames emit deafening roaring sounds.
source: al-Quran 67:7 — 'They Mendengar from it a dreadful inhaling while it boils up.'

fact: The heat causes Kulit to peel off completely and regrow repeatedly.
source: al-Quran 4:56

fact: The inhabitants will Menangis out from unbearable heat but will get no relief.
source: al-Quran 43:77 — 'And they will call, "O Malik, Membenarkan your Lord put an Menamatkan to us!" He will say, "Indeed, you will Kekal."'

fact: Neraka has Tujuh distinct layers of Api, each more intense than the one Di atas it.
source: Tafsir Ibn Kathir on al-Quran 15:44 — 'It has Tujuh gates; for every Pintu gerbang is of them a portion designated.'

fact: The Makanan of the Rakyat of Neraka will be only from the Pokok of Zaqqum.
source: al-Quran 37:62-66 — 'Indeed, the Pokok of Zaqqum is Makanan for the sinful...'

fact: Zaqqum is a Pokok that grows from the bottom of Neraka.
source: al-Quran 37:64 — 'It is a Pokok that emerges from the bottom of Hellfire.'

fact: Its fruits resemble the heads of devils in ugliness.
source: al-Quran 37:65 — 'Its emerging Buah-buahan as if it were heads of devils.'

fact: Eating Zaqqum will boil inside their bellies like Melebur Tembaga.
source: al-Quran 44:43-46 — 'Indeed, the Pokok of Zaqqum will be Makanan for the sinful. Like Melebur Tembaga it will boil in their bellies.'

fact: They will be forced to eat Zaqqum despite loathing it.
source: al-Quran 37:66 — 'Then indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.'

fact: They will have no Makanan except from Dari' — a bitter thorny Tumbuhan.
source: al-Quran 88:6 — 'They will have no Makanan except from Dari'.'

fact: Dari' neither nourishes nor satisfies hunger.
source: al-Quran 88:7 — 'Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.'

fact: Their only Minuman will be scalding Air (Hamim).
source: al-Quran 6:70 — '...and they will be given to Minuman scalding Air which will sever their intestines.'

fact: They will also Minuman pus (Ghasaq) from the wounds of other Rakyat of Neraka.
source: al-Quran 38:57-58 — 'Boiling Air and pus to Merasa...'

fact: They will be made to Minuman a mixture of boiling Air and Melebur Tembaga.
source: al-Quran 18:29 — '...if they Mencari relief, they will be relieved with Air like Melebur brass, which scalds their faces.'

fact: Their Minuman will tear apart their insides as it is swallowed.
source: al-Quran 14:16-17 — 'He will be given boiling Air to Minuman; he will gulp it but will hardly be able to swallow it, and Kematian will Datang to him from everywhere, but he will not Mati.'

fact: They will be clothed in garments of Api.
source: al-Quran 22:19 — '...garments of Api will be Luka out for them...'

fact: Their clothes will be made from Melebur Tembaga.
source: al-Quran 22:20 — '...and scalding Air will be poured upon their heads.' (Tafsir: Melebur Tembaga garments)

fact: Their shoes will be of Api, heating their skulls from Di bawah.
source: Hadis — Sahih Muslim 212 (description of least punished man in Neraka having Api under his feet that boils his Otak)

fact: Their beds and coverings will also be of Api.
source: al-Quran 7:41 — 'For them are beds of Hellfire and Di atas them coverings (of Api).'

fact: The fuel of Neraka is Rakyat and stones.
source: al-Quran 66:6 — '...whose fuel is Rakyat and stones.'

fact: The stones are sulfur stones, intensely flammable.
source: Tafsir Ibn Kathir on al-Quran 66:6

fact: Even the idols that were worshiped will be fuel in Neraka.
source: al-Quran 21:98 — 'Indeed, you and what you Beribadah besides Allah are firewood for Neraka. You will Masuk it.'

fact: The bodies of its dwellers themselves become fuel for its flames.
source: al-Quran 3:10 — '...the Api, whose fuel is men and stones.'

fact: Neraka is constantly fed new fuel so its flames never weaken.
source: al-Quran 2:24 — '...then Takut the Api whose fuel is men and stones, Disediakan for the disbelievers.'

fact: The Minuman will Luka their intestines into pieces from its heat.
source: al-Quran 47:15 — '...they will be given boiling Air to Minuman that will sever their intestines.'

fact: They will be dragged to Minuman while being beaten.
source: al-Quran 37:67-68 — 'Then indeed, they will Kembali to the blazing Api. Then they will be told to Minuman scalding Air.'

fact: Their throats will choke on the Makanan, yet they must swallow it.
source: al-Quran 73:13 — 'Makanan that chokes, and a painful Hukuman.'

fact: They will Memohon for cool Air but will be denied.
source: al-Quran 43:75 — 'No relief will there be for them...'

fact: Their Pakaian will be garments of Getah (tar).
source: al-Quran 14:50 — 'Their garments will be of Getah, and their faces covered with Api.'

fact: Their clothes will ignite and Terbakar their Kulit.
source: Tafsir Ibn Kathir on al-Quran 14:50

fact: Their sandals will be of Api, boiling their brains like a cauldron.
source: Sahih Muslim 212 — 'The lightest Hukuman in Neraka is a man whose sandals are of Api, causing his Otak to boil.'

fact: Chains of Api will be wrapped around their necks.
source: al-Quran 40:71 — 'When the shackles are around their necks and the chains, they will be dragged.'

fact: They will be dragged through boiling Air and then into the Api.
source: al-Quran 40:72 — 'In boiling Air; then in the Api they will be filled with Nyalaan.'

fact: The fuel of Neraka is men and stones, showing its massive intensity.
source: al-Quran 2:24 — '...then Takut the Api whose fuel is men and stones.'

fact: The person who will Menerima the least Hukuman among the Rakyat of the Api will be a man who will have two Hidup coals placed under his feet, due to which his Otak will boil.
source: Sahih al-Bukhari 6562, Sahih Muslim 212

source: al-Quran 4:56

source: al-Quran 47:15

fact: Those who are gathered on their faces to Neraka — those are the worst in position.

fact: Those who disbelieve will have Luka out for them garments of Api; boiling Air will be poured over their heads.

source: al-Quran 47:15, al-Quran 35:37

fact: Lest a soul should say, 'Oh [how great is] my Penyesalan over what I neglected in regard to Allah.'
source: al-Quran 39:56

source: al-Quran 7:38

fact: Their eyes will be covered with humiliation; they will not be able to Melihat.
